732200.name: Fantasy Grounds - Southlands Heroes (5E)
732200.description:
Southlands Heroes

WHEN EVIL STIRS IN THE SOUTHLANDS, MIGHTY HEROES WILL ARISE!
New Options for 5th Edition Heroes
Demonic voices mutter and howl in the desert. Strange lights appear among the trees in the jungles depths; and packs of twisted creatures emerge at night to hunt the grasslands.
But you do not fear these things. You are a hero of the Southlandsand by your skill, strength, luck, or the favor of the gods, you will become a legend.
Southlands Heroes gives you everything you need to play in a 5th Edition campaign set in the Southlands. Southlands Heroes includes:
  • Rules for playing Southlands aasimar, gnolls, lizardfolk, minotaurs, tosculi waspfolk, and werelions
  • New Ambush Predator rogue archetype, Hivemaster variant ranger, and Circle of the Hive and Circle of the Swarm variant druids
  • New backgrounds: Child of the Divine, Temple Slave, Desert Runner, and more!
  • Match wits with djinn, pit your strength against mighty white apes, and plunder the lost temples of demon gods.
  • The Southlands await!
Converted by: Rob Twohy
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
